name: Haka the Robber
description:
Play as the graverobber Haka and sneak through a grave while trying to collect money on the way in this stealth+roguelike game.

Created for Ludum Dare 41 whose theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres": https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/haka-the-robber

Font from https://www.dafont.com/stylish-charm.font
